product_name: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw, BPA-Free Sports Water Bottle, Great for Travel, 32 Oz, Very, Very Dark
description: 32-ounce insulated stainless-steel water bottle with a FreeSip spout and push-button lid with lock. Patented FreeSip spout designed for either sipping upright through the built-in straw or tilting back to swig from the spout opening. Protective push-to-open lid keeps spout clean; convenient carry loop doubles as a lock. Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours; wide opening for cleaning and adding ice. BPA and phthalate-free; hand wash cup, dishwasher-safe lid; not for use with hot liquids.

latest_reviews.comment: Over Priced, but the value is there.
Best water bottle of all time
